FuncDef: This command deletes Managed SAPs (MSAPs) created by the MSAP policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing managed SAP policy name. A string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
Specifies to remove only the MSAPs in an idle state.
